meanings.definition: A group of nonflammable, noncorrosive, nonexplosive, and chemically stable refrigerants used in air conditioning systems.
meanings.sent1: The technician added freons to the air conditioner to keep it cool.
meanings.sent2: The freons leaked out of the system, causing the air conditioner to malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The freons in the air conditioner decided to take a vacation and left the room feeling warm.
meanings.sent4: Her love for freons was as cool and refreshing as a breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The freons hummed quietly as they circulated through the air conditioning unit.

meanings.definition: Any of several simple fluorinated hydrocarbons containing carbon, chlorine, and fluorine, used as refrigerants and as propellants in aerosols.
meanings.sent1: She read the label to make sure the product contained freons for effective cooling.
meanings.sent2: The freons in the aerosol can propelled the spray out with force.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous freons in the fridge played a prank by freezing everything inside.
meanings.sent4: His words were like freons, chilling her to the core with their harshness.
meanings.sent5: The freons danced in the air, creating a mesmerizing display of colors and patterns.
